article:
Gao Ming was very busy yesterday.He got up  _  7:10 in the morning.He washed his face  _  and had some milk and bread  _  breakfast.It was a fine day.He went to school early.He had four  _  in the morning.He had a little  _  after lunch, _  he worked very hard in class all day.He played basketball after school and then went home.On his way  home  he bought a pen.
When he  _  home,he had a short rest.After that he helped his parents.He quickly had  _  and cleaned the house.He watched TV for half an hour.Then he finished his homework at half past nine.He  went to bed  at ten o'clock.
